short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create a web page by sending an email

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
publishthis.email is the fastest way to publish online. Simply write an email with the content you want to publish, send it to page@publishthis.email, and a web page is created from your content.

This extension for Gmail users makes the process even easier, by providing an interface for setting the correct To: address, adding to your collections.
